inn1.comm: first up, Zaheer v Tharanga, outside off and the batsman shoulders arms
gets it to nip in a touch, pitching on a length and that is tucked towards midwicket
outside off and another leave
sways away with the angle, Dilshan is happy to allow it to the keeper
Dilshan gets a leading edge towards cover, he was looking to clip that leg stump ball towards midwicket
the first extra of the day, wide from Zaheer
length ball well outside off, not so wide as to be deemed illegal, left alone
good start for Irfan, starting just outside off and holding its line, Tharanga raises his bat and lets it to the keeper
short from Irfan, Tharanga wanted to slam that through the leg side, that sat up to be hit, Tharanga only hit it as far as Gambhir at midwicket, a misfield allows a single
length ball moves in towards the pads, whipped towards deep square leg, there's time enough to take three
length ball outside off, no alarming movement yet, defended towards extra cover
some bounce there for Irfan, outside off and that is collected by Dhoni above waits height
length ball outside off, pushed towards point off the front foot
short and well outside off, guided down to third man for a single
swings in towards middle, worked towards midwicket for a single
down the leg side, Dilshan looks to glance that but misses, a free run for Sri Lanka

bizarre dismissal, Dilshan had no idea where the ball went after he played that, he defended it off the front foot, it bounced near his feet and bounced back towards the stumps, Dilshan was looking for the single as he wasn't aware where the ball was, it bounced a second time before hitting the stumps, Dilshan is bowled
length ball outside off, played softly towards cover for a quick single
lovely delivery there, pitching back of a length and moves away, Tharanga is squared up as he tries to play that, past the outside edge to the keeper
once more Tharanga isn't comfortable playing the ball that leaves him, looked to defend that from the crease, again he doesn't get bat on it
short of length and just outside off, tapped towards point for a single
length ball well outside off, defended towards cover off the front foot
down the leg side, and another free run for SL
squeezes out a full ball in front of square leg, not wide enough of the fielder to ge ta single
length ball is punched towards mid-off
Irfan completely loses his line as he knocked the bails off before delivering the ball, that one is way down the leg side
nearly an edge, Tharanga was trying to cut that shortish ball, it moved away from Tharanga who is beaten
gets a thick edge down to third man for a single to end the over
way outside the off stump, Tharanga chases after it but doesn't connect
much better line, the ball jags in a bit after pitching outside off, but the movement is mainly after it passed the stumps
once gain Zaheer keeps it tight around off, Tharanga lifts his bat over his head as he lets the ball through
length ball heading for off, solid forward defensive from Tharanga
short of length and well outside off, Tharanga has been chasing plenty of wide deliveries, this time he connects  well, crisply hit past point for four

that confident shot off the previous ball doesn't do Tharanga much good, one again he chases a wide one, it was moving away as well, Tharanga had to reach out for that one, this time he edges, through to Dhoni, not much footwork from Tharanga there, Zaheer has his second
massive appeal for lbw from Zaheer, but that was pitching well outside leg, easy call for the umpire
a crisp hit from Sangakkara, pitched up delivery is driven towards mid-off, can't beat the fielder
seams in towards the pads, Irfan enquires about the lbw, it was going to miss leg

Chandimal is gone for a duck, India are on top, he was caught on the crease as he looked to play that delivery to the leg side, it was on a length, pitching on middle, Chandimal missed, the ball moved in a hint and struck the pads, the umpires agrees, correctly, with Irfan's appeal and SL are 20/3
Mahela starts confidently with a push towards extra cover
outside off and that is left alone
length ball on off stump, solid defence from Mahela
starts outside off and moves away, Sanga leaves
short of length and seaming away once more, another leave
pitched up and this is driven down the ground off the front foot, between the bowler and mid-on, supremely timed and that is four
Zaheer reverts to the outside off line, once more Sanga isn't interested in it
wide outside off again, but this one doesn't moves away like the rest, holds its line, Sanga watches it through to the keeper
once more, Sanga doesn't want to have anything to do with a delivery several feet outside off
back of a length ball outside off, pushed off the back foot towards the off side, that was 128kph
pitched up and just outside off, defended by Mahela
shorter and around off, Mahela wants to send that to the square leg boundary, he doesn't connect
length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
just outside off, 125kph, Mahela flirts with that one, doesn't nick it though
outside off and left alone
short of length and outside off, Sangakkara leaves it through to the keeper
guides this one down to third man, a hint of away movement for Zaheer
pitched up this time, and angling away outside off, Mahela leaves
length ball on off stump, defended from the crease towards the off side
length ball on middle, more confident defence
off the thigh pad and down to fine leg for four leg byes, Irfan gets his line wrong there
short of length and outside off, superbly struck by Sangakkara, takes a couple of paces down the track and chops that to the point boundary
length and closer to off stump, pushed towards mid-off with soft hands, take a tight single
huge appeal for lbw, a short of length ball that struck Mahela on the back leg, hit Mahela on the thigh pads, height probably saved him there, everything else looked okay
Mahela takes a big stride out and clips the short of length ball towards the square leg boundary, played that in the air, well wide of the fielder in the deep
slapped towards backward point, 13 off the over
length ball is pushed towards mid-off for a quick single, Sanga has done that several times already today
length ball is defend towards midwicket
length ball outside off, driven past a diving point for a couple
on the pads, whipped towards deep square leg, doesn't go all the way to the rope, enough time to take three
just outside off and that is left alone by Sanga

inside-edged as Sangakkara looks to defend to the off side, that one moved in a hint, the ball rolls towards midwicket, Mahela wants a single, Sanga doesn't, Mahela has to sprint back after reaching midway
Irfan continues, sends it in towards the off stump, defended by Mahela, who takes the bottom hand off the bat
just outside off, guides it down to third man for a single
pushed towards cover for another single, Sri Lanka's batsmen looking a bit more comfortable now
length ball on middle, tucked towards deep square leg for one more
slides it in towards the pads, easily helped away towards fine leg, Zaheer has plenty to do, he gets there in time, but lets the ball slip through his fingers
pushed off the front foot towards cover for a single
sends in a bouncer, outside off, Mahela initially thought of going after that, but then pulls out and get safely out of the line of that
short of length ball outside off, guided towards deep point for an easy single
length ball just outside off, 138kph, defended towards the bowler
length ball is driven towards extra cover off the front foot
digs it short once more, this time Mahela plays the pull, a controlled shot, no attempt to power the ball, towards midwicket
length ball is defended to the off side
a touch short from Rahul and outside off, Mahela stabs that past backward point to the third man boundary, not much turn here for Rahul
on the shorter side again, Mahela shuffles across the stumps and nudges the ball towards midwicket
fuller this time and outside off, pushed towards point
pitched up again, 91kph, blocked to the off side
length ball outside off, chopped towards Ashwin at backward point
punched towards mid-off
Dinda fires it in towards the off stump, defended to the off side once more
lovely hands from Mahela, sends the ball behind backward point and towards the third man boundary
short ball from Dinda, 140.7kph, pulled towards deep square leg
pitched up and that is inside-edged on to the pads, Dinda was hoping that would roll on to the stumps, instead it rolls in the direction of point
a good over from Dinda ends with a good delivery, a 140kph short ball, off Sanga's glove and loops towards square leg, it seems to have hurt his finger. Physio taking a look
looks to work that length ball from Zaheer to the leg side, off the leading edge towards cover
length ball is superbly timed by Sanga, hardly any effort in that push past the bowler, beats a diving Rahul Sharma at mid-on, gets his two runs
short of length nad outside off, elegantly helped towards sweeper cover, brings up the 50 stand
short of length ball outside off, 128kph, Mahela happy to allow it to the keeper
length ball on off stump, Mahela moves across and tucks the ball towards midwicket
short of length and just outside off, dropped towards cover and Sanga sets off for a single, Mahela doesn't, Sanga hasn't gone too far though, turns back in time
133.4kph, short of length and outside off, Mahela looks to chop that past point but is beaten
slanting in towards the pads, helped along with the angle for a single
a mild lbw appeal, there was a big inside-edge there as Sanga played that length ball from the crease
back of a length, 137kph, defended from the crease by Sanga, not much movement around any more for the quicks
carefully pushed towards cover off the front foot to end the over
huge appeal for lbw, that was going on to hit leg stump but it pitched outside leg, Zaheer was convinced though
again on the leg stump line, easy to work it down to fine leg, off the pads actually, leg byes signalled
switches to a middle stump line, defended by Mahela
length ball on middle and off, turned towards midwicket
length ball on the pads, worked towards midwicket, this is turning into a very good over in the Powerplay
on the pads, helped along to deep backward square leg for a single to end the over
short ball is pulled towards deep midwicket for a single
short of length ball outside off, helped along towards sweeper cover, Sanga and Mahela back to doing what they do so well in the middle over, the calm accumulation of risk-free singles
shortish and outside off, stabbed towards deep backward point for one more
pulled towards deep square leg for one more

Mahela skips away towards leg and plays an inside-out shot over cover, the fielder there was interested in that, he jumped was it was too far for him, Mahela gets a risky boundary, he seems to realise more adventure is needed in the Powerplay
and another easy single to end the over
full, slower ball, Mahela adjusts, waits for it before helping it behind square leg
length ball on off stump, worked towards cover for one more
short of length ball on middle, Mahela nudges it behind square leg for one more
and another single, this time to mid-off
lovely from Mahela, short and a bit of width, Mahela is very, very strong on the cut, slaps that past point for a boundary
defended by Mahela to end the over
Ashwin starts round the wicket, on a length around off, defended
fuller and outside off, guided towards cover
over the wicket to the right-hander, tossed up by ashwin, defended towards square leg
fuller and just outside off, worked in front of square leg, Mahela is so good to working the ball in the gaps
well outside off, Mahela gets on one knee and looks to sweep, he misses and is struck on the pads, hit outside the line though
helped towards deep midwicket, not too much turn for Ashwin so far
length ball is defended to the off side
a lofted off-drive, over cover and towards the sweeper, Mahela gets a couple
full and just outside off, Mahela digs that out towards the off side
Mahela goes for that cute little dab he tries, he's beaten outside off
a hint of turn for Rahul, pushed towards cover for a single
short of length ball pitching on leg stump, Sanga scoots across the stumps and nudges the ball towards square leg, Sri Lanka's 100 comes up
length ball is driven back towards the bowler
more careful placing of the ball, worked off the pads behind square leg
length ball from round the wicket, punched back to the bowler
slight width for Sanga, he slaps it towards point, another dot ball
eased down to long-off for a single
down the leg side and that's a wide
length ball on middle and off, clipped behind square leg for one more
flighted by Rahul, pitched up, and that is lofted towards long-off, not with much power, lands well short of the man in the deep, controlled shot from Mahela
stays in the crease and looks to drive a flighted full ball, he doesn't connect
giving some air in this air, full once more, defended by Sanga
slightly shorter this time, Sanga plays a shot he plays often in the middle overs: a drive towards long-off, all along the ground
Mahela looks to paddle that full toss on middle stump, top-edges it towards the off side for a single, Mahela lucky that didn't pop towards a fielder
another effortless drive to long-off for a single
length ball from round the wicket, defended to the bowler
another easy single for Sanga
played with soft hands towards midwicket, thinks of a single but decides against it
this time he nudges it behind square leg, wide enough of the fielder to take two, that gives him his 68th ODI fifty
two more, all about placement, plays it with soft hands to wide mid-on
on the pads, driven to midwicket, straight at the fielder
full ball is driven towards mid-off by sanga
length ball on the pads, worked behind square leg for two more, these guys again showing you don't need power-hitting to thrive in limited-overs
fullish and on the pads, driven towards long-on for an ambled single
length ball on middle and off, tapped towards midwicket
plenty of air on that one, full and on the leg stump, eased to long-on
overpitched on middle and off, driven towards Kohli at long-on, Mahela called for two, but Kohli was quickly onto the ball so its only a single, another century stand for Mahela
Mahela reverse-sweeps towards point, it's a shot he's using more and more regularly in recent years
pushed towards mid-on for one more
punched to cover for a single, Raina misfielded there to allow the run
nudged to square leg once more, no run this time
length ball on the pads, defended by Mahela
goes for the scoop, down to fine leg for a single
Sanga goes back in the crease and clips the ball to square leg
towards backward point where there's a diving stop from Kohli
clipped towards midwicket this time
length ball on middle and off, pushed to the left of the bowler, who moves across to field
flighted, plenty of air there, full ball on legstump, Sanga moved across exposing his stumps, paddled towards fine leg
length ball is driven firmly towards the bowler's left, Rahul doesn't stop this one, so the ball goes towards long-on
driven for another single, we have seen this so many times from Sanga and Mahela, the patient build-up of the innings in the middle overs
goes for the paddle this time, a single to fie leg, no fours in the last eight overs for Sri Lanka
what a way to end that boundary-drought, powerfully struck by Mahela, gets on his knee and sweeps that to the square leg boundary
on the pads, worked towards deep square leg for one more
slapped towards deep point for one more
spin for Ashwin, gets this one to turn sharply, past the batsman and down the leg side, strikes Dhoni on the glove
Sangakkara now gets to his fifty, pushed down the ground for a single

just as these two batsmen looked to be demoralising India with another of their solid stands, Rahul has the breakthrough, Mahela was caught on the backfoot playing that one, it pitched on middle and leg, went straight on, struck on the pads and looked to be hitting leg stump, Mahela isn't so sure, the umpire Dharmasena is, big wicket this
length ball on the pads, nudged towards midwicket
short and well outside off, slapped towards extra cover
length ball outside off, driven to long-off for one more
played off the back foot, and as he has done so often today, eases the ball to long-off for one more, I'd like to see how many runs he gets in singles to long-off each innings
defended towards point for a quick single
Ashwin gets this one to spin sharply, Sanga defends towards cover
drops it short and should have been put away for four, Sanga pulls powerfully but a diving stop from Rohit at midwicket cuts that off
on middle and leg, to backward square for one more
yet again, pushed to mid-off for a single
full ball is driven back towards the bowler
length ball is worked towards long-on for one more
full ball on middle, and inside-out drive towards long-off for a single
length ball is clipped to midwicket for one more
length ball on the pads, Sanga pats it towards long-on for a single, he can do that all day
a touch short, Sanga gets on the back foot, and that is swiped past midwicket for a boundary
the ball is spinning for Ashwin, pitching outside off, turning away, slapped to point
patted back to the bowler
off the back foot and chopped towards cover
defended to the leg side by Mathews
gets forward and prods this towards cover, a quiet over from Ashwin
from round the wicket, this goes straight on, defended by Sanga
pitched up and that is eased towards long-off
length ball is deadbatted off the front foot by Mathews
on the pads, tucked behind square leg by Mathews
pitching outside leg, Mathews moves away from leg and drives it to long-on
Sanga charges down and chips this in the air, not often that he drives uppishly, well controlled by Sanga, lands well short of Zaheer at long-off
eased towards cover for a single
length ball outside off, from over the wicket, driven towards long-on
driven towards long-off for a single
Mathews expecting that to turn, but it went on straight, Mathews is beaten
tucks it towards midwicket, dot ball
squeezed behind square leg for a single
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards long-off
not the most graceful of shots from Sangakkara, flat-batted a short of length ball over the bowler's had for four, not too well timed either
short of length ball from round the wicket is defended towards cover
back of a length once more, defended towards extra cover
well outside off, guided towards backward point
shortish ball outside off, pulled towards deep midwicket for a single
full from Ashwin, helped along to long-on for a single
inside-out lofted drive from Sangakkara, backs away to make room, and sends the ball towards long-off
worked behind square leg for one more
ooh nearly, Sanga didn't pick the carrom ball, he was looking to drive to the leg side, a leading edge towards cover, lands short of the fielder
poked to midwicket for a single
behind square leg to get the fifth single of the over, India won't mind that in the Powerplay
short of length and outside off, pushed towards point
Mathews has had enough of the singles, he skips beyond leg stump and thumps it over cover, gets him a boundary
full ball, Mathews make room and drives towards extra cover
Sanga charges down and looks for another flat-batted hit, Dinda fired it in short, and the ball was too close to Sanga's body to allow the batsman to connect
jumps beyond leg as he looks to crash the length ball through cover, once more he doesn't connect

gone! full and well outside off from Dinda, Sanga once more was backing away from the stumps, he had to reach across for this outside off delivery, he can only chop it tamely towards point, end of another fine innings from Sanga, seemed to have run out of patience towards the end, after re-building the innings with his typical effortless singles down the ground
length ball outside off, squeezed towards point
blocked off the front foot towards backward point, a misfield let Mendis get a single
short of length ball which goes straight on, pushed towards mid-off for a single
eased towards short fine leg for a single
spins in from outside off, defended to the leg side, just four off the over
short of length and outside off, poked towards backward point, Mendis wanted one but that would have been disastrous
slower ball from Zaheer, just outside off, helped towards third man for a single
mild lbw appeal from Zaheer, leg byes signalled as Mathews was struck on the front pad by a ball angling down the leg side
short and outside off, slower one, looks to swipe that one but is surprised by the lack of pace, bottom-edges it, on the bounce through to the keeper
looks to power it through the off side again, a short of length ball outside off, another bottom-edge
again short of length, on off and middle, Mendis wanted to hammer that over midwicket, doesn't connect, off the body towards point
gets the ball to spin, but starting on leg stump and going further down, wide
length ball well outside off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
pitched up and Mendis gets it away towards mid-on, Rahul Sharma chases after it and keeps the batsmen to a single
slightly short just outside off, slapped past backward point for a boundary
length ball pitching on off stump, punched towards long-off
tossed up, full ball is worked towards midwicket, Rahul Sharma has to chase after that again
short of length and on off stump, squeezed towards point for a single
length ball outside off, punched towards point by Mendis for a single, brings up the Sri Lankan 200
down the leg side, and that is a wide
full and wide, slashed towards long-off, a fumble from Raina allows a second, not his best of days in the field
length ball on the pad,s helped down to fin leg
short and wide outside off, Mendis slaps that high over point for four, that's his first boundary
defends a length ball on the off stump
a touch shorter, Mendis pushes that towards midwicket
a length ball on middle, played towards square leg
another boundary for Mendis, the reverse-sweep this time, powerfully hit, kept it along the ground as well, good hit
tossed up, spinning away, Mendis looking to cut, he misses that
not something you see very often, Mendis has left the ball to the keeper, in the 43rd over, that one was again flighted and spinning away
swept towards backward square leg for a single
played towards midwicket and a quick single is pinched
on middle stump, clipped towards midwicket for a couple
slapped towards deep point for a single
length ball on middle and off, pushed to the left of the bowler, Mendis takes a couple of steps down the ground as he plays that
Dhoni was celebrating a caught-behind there, but he hadn't heard the no-ball call, it was short and wide, Mathews looking to guide it towards backward point, edges it through to Dhoni
full ball is thumped fiercely towards Zaheer at cover, straight at him though
punched towards mid-off for a single
short of length ball on off stump, clipped behind square leg for a single
opens the face to guide a full ball towards point for a single
Dinda sees Mendis charging down, so digs in the bouncer, but it is too short, goes over the batsman's head and the umpire calls it  a wide
short again from Dinda, Mendis gave it his all as he heaved at it, mistimed badly, the ball loops over Zaheer at short midwicket, Mendis survives
short of length and well outside off, pushed towards deep point, Mendis raced through the first, hoping there was time for the second, but there wasn't
full ball well outside off, muscled towards Zaheer at cover

Smashed! Mendis clubs that short ball, the third of the over (or fourth?) over the midwicket boundary for the first six of the innings, the fifty stand comes up in quick time, and questions over Mendis' promotion will quietly subside
a full ball is clipped to midwicket for a single
length ball is clubbed towards long-on for a single
short of length ball is guided towards third man, wide enough to take two
short of length and outside off, slapped towards sweeper cover for a single
full ball just outside off, driven towards long-on for one more
slower ball, bowled from wide of the crease, patted towards point for a single
full and wide, forced towards long-off
outside off and that is chopped towards deep point, that was full from Dinda
full again, outside off once more, squeezed down towards third man
Mathews gets a couple, though not where he wanted to, he was looking to scoop that shortish ball towards fine leg, edges it towards third man instead
full from Dinda, Mathews muscles that through cover, Ashwin can't get across in time, Dinda leaking runs here, that's only Mathews' third four but he's on 49 off 47
Mathews gets to his half-century, pushed towards point for a single
clipped towards midwicket to end an over that brought in 11 for Sri Lanka
Zaheer starts his final over with a shortish ball outside off, whipped towards midwicket by Mendis
a length ball heading for the leg stump is thumped towards long-on by Mathews
short of length and that is swiped to square leg, straight at the fielder but a tight single is taken
Mendis attempts a reverse-pull as Zaheer drops it short outside off, Mendis can't connect, Zaheer walks up to the batsman and has a word
punched down the ground for a single, Zaheer and Mendis are both smiling at each other as Mendis completes the single
superbly done by Mathews, he made room by skipping beyond leg and then forced that through the off side, all along the ground to the cover boundary, SL gallop to 263, the partnership swells to 81
a full ball is clubbed towards mid-off, a bad bounce for Dinda but his body was behind that, hit on the chest I think
full and just outside off, Mathews carves it towards sweeper cover
nearly a yorker from Irfan, Mendis somehow manages to get plenty of power behind his drive, Pathan stops it well though
whipped to midwicket for a single
slower ball from Irfan, very slow, only 88kph, Mathews was through with his shot as he looked to power it over mid-off, can't connect
superbly hit by Mathews, a length ball is drilled down the ground, mid-on is wide and has no chance if stopping that
Dinda to bowl the final over, a short of length ball to start, is send flying towards sweeper cover by Mendis, Kohli makes a diving stop at sweeper cover to stop the boundary
boom! Mathews likes hitting sixes in the final over, doesn't he? a shortish ball - aback-of-the-hand slower ball - is crashed way over long-on for six
a full delivery is drilled towards long-off for a quick two, Mathews is gasping for breath here
a yorker just outside off, squeezed out towards extra cover for a single that brings up the 100 stand
a shortish ball, Mendis was looking to slog that to the midwicket boundary, he misses

length ball, poor ball, this time Mendis connects, and connects well, hammers that to the midwicket boundary, 97 runs off the final 10 overs, India's death-bowling conundrum continues, Mathews raises his bat as he walks off, Mendis lifts his helmet as the  crowd cheers

inn2.comm: short and wide, well outside off, left alone
drops the ball at his feet and sets off for a quick single
swing and a miss from Sehwag, that ball moved away a touch outside off
blocks this length ball towards extra cover, and Sehwag sets off for a quick single, a direct hit there and Sehwag was a goner
short of length ball on leg stump, Gambhir jumps to get on top of the bounce, drops it towards square leg
sharp short ball from Malinga, terrific response from Gambhir, that was just outside off, Gambhir helps it along over the slip for four
starts with a delivery that nips in from back of a length, Sehwag was looking to crash that through the off side but doesn't connect
pitched up, outside off, whipped towards deep midwicket for a couple
firmly driven by Sehwag, back towards the bowler, no footwork at all from Sehwag, not too well timed from Sehwag

Sehwag falls early, looking to swing it through the cover but ends up giving an overhead catch to the substitute fielder at cover, as in the second match Perera removes Sehwag cheaply, Perera continues to find one-day cricket easy
Virat Kohli lets his first delivery through to the keeper
Perera gets that one to swerve in sharply off the pitch, Kohli can't get bat on that, the movement is too much, he's beaten and the ball goes through to the keeper
superbly hit by Gambhir, just outside off, not too much width, but Gambhir loves scoring around the point area, this was guided behind point for a boundary, timing was top-class on that

nothing top-class about that stop, a french cut for four (or a chinese cut as the ycall it in France), it was a full ball, a thick inside-edge squirts past the stumps and to the fine-leg boundary, Malinga smiles ruefully
length ball on off stump, confidently defended by Gambhir
just outside off, Gambhir guides it towards backward point
a yorker on off stump is blocked back towards the bowler
down the leg side, off the pads and past the keeper for four leg-byes, 12 off the over
a length ball is worked towards deep backward square leg for a single
short of length is defended down the track
short of length ball outside off, left alone
length ball just outside off, left alone
another boundary for Gambhir, he charges down the track and whips that full ball over cover for four
full ball on middle is defended towards mid-on
short of length ball on legstump, defended towards midwicket
length and around off stump, carefully pushed off the front foot towards cover
shortish ball is pulled firmly by Kohli, can't get it past midwicket
length ball outside off is guided down to third man for a single
full and swinging in towards off, blocked down the track
off the pads and down to fine leg
first ball is solidly defended by Kohli
wide from Perera, pitched  up and that is thrashed through cover by Kohli, gets on the front foot and sends that through the gap for four
nearly edges it through to the keeper, shortish ball, outside off, Kohli looks to slap that in front of point but is beaten
fuller and close to off stump, defended towards midwicket
length ball slanting into the pads, worked towards midwicket
wonderful timing from Gambhir, that wasn't the best of deliveries from Perera, length and on the pads, Gambhir eases it towards the deep midwicket boundary
Isuru Udana bowling now, he didn't start off too well in his debut game four days ago, fives wides I think in his first over, today he begins with a back of length ball around off, defended
keeps it around off, blocked by Kohli
punched towards mid-off, where a misfield allows Kohli to return for the second
driven towards short cover by Kohli
a full ball on the pads, played uppishly towards short midwicket, Kohli is unhappy at having missed out on that one, but that could easily have carried to the fielder there as well
last ball of the over is played towards backward point
Gambhir shuffles down the track and lofts that over extra cover for  a boundary, using his feet as he looks to throw Thisara off his length
stays in the crease, and nudges the ball towards square leg for a couple
short of length and outside off, guided towards backward point for a single
length ball is driven towards cover off the front foot, a sharp bit of fielding by substitute Senanayake
length ball on off stump is clipped towards midwicket for a single
length ball is tapped past the bowler for a single
full ball on off, pushed to cover for a single
lovely shot from Kohli, almost a half-volley from Udana, Kohli caresses that past mid-on for four, great timing there
short and wide, Kohli chases and bottom-edges it towards the keeper
too far outside off, Kohli chases but doesn't get bat on it
and again too wide outside off
better from Udana, full ball is worked towards midwicket by Kohli
length ball on off stump, blocked down the track
short of length ball is defended towards point
length ball is pushed towards cover, a diving stop there
length ball on off stump, careful defence to the off side by Kohli
full ball is squeezed towards square leg for a single
a yorker on middle stump, dug out in front  of square leg, Udana swopped in and picked up the ball only a few yards away from the stumps and hit the wicket, Kohli had just made it
short of length ball on off stump, defended to the leg side by Kohli
length ball is whipped towards mid-on
length ball outside off, defended
short ball from Udana, not enough pace to hassle Gambhir, who stays on the back foot and pull shim behind square for four
defended towards midwicket for a single
better line from Udana this, on off stump, Kohli plays it towards point and sets off only to be sent back by Gambhir
short of length ball is played back towards the bowler
down the leg side and that is another wide from Udana
another wide, Udana can't believe it, he want appealing for a caught-behind chance as Kohli was looking to lash that through the off side, he doesn't get bat on it
a full deliver is worked towards midwicket by Kohli
mild lbw appeal as the ball jags in towards the pads, Kohli was looking to send that towards midwicket, but that hit Kohli at the top of the pad, too high to be given
eased towards sweeper cover for a single
length ball around off stump, defended towards cover by Gambhir
length ball around off stump, pushed through the off side for a single
length ball is worked towards sweeper cover for a couple, Kohli moves to 19 off 34
short of length ball is helped along to third man for a single
length ball on off stump, defended by Kohli, Udana continues to bowl from round the wicket
short of length ball is crunched through cover for a couple
very wide outside off from Udana, might have been called a wide if Kohli left it alone, Kohli chases after it and gets it off the toe of the bat towards sweeper cover
slanting in towards the pads, from over the wicket, glanced towards fine leg
length ball on the pads clipped towards midwicket for a single
short of length ball outside off, dabbed towards point
bouncer from Mathews, Kohli went for the hook but the bounce was too much for Kohli, struck on the helmet and the ball loops over slip and to the third man boundary for four leg byes
terrific work from Udana at deep point, Kohli hammered a wide delivery and it was seemingly headed for the boundary, but Udana made a diving stop
an incutter, slightly slower from Mathews, defended to the leg side by Kohli
outside off, pushed towards backward point, Dilshan dives to his left and makes a one-handed stop, he flings in a direct hit as well, but Gambhir had managed to get to safety
length ball is driven off the front foot towards extra cover
a yorker is dug out towards mid-off
spin straightaway for Herath, turns away from off stump, an outside edge sends the ball towards third man
fuller and heading for off stump, defended towards point
short of length ball is slapped towards deep point by gambhir
length ball heading for middle stump, blocked off the front foot
arm ball from Herath, defended off the front foot once more, a mild lbw appeal as Herath thought that might have hit pad first
drilled towards long-off for a single
spins in towards leg stump, punched off the back foot towards long-on for a single
chopped towards point off the back foot
length ball on middle and off, blocked off the front foot
Gambhir jumps down the track and lofts this inside-out to the extra cover boundary, there's a sweeper and a long-off but there's a vast gap for Gambhir
defended off the front  foot towards midwicket
skips onto the back foot and slaps this towards deep point for a couple
length ball on off and middle, blocked off the front foot
spinning towards off, punched off the back foot towards deep extra cover
Gambhir get well back in the crease, slaps the ball past cover
length ball is easily driven towards sweeper cover for a single
Gambhir shuffles down the track and pushes the ball towards long-on, gets to his second successive half-century
full ball is punched back to the bowler
looks to drive off the back foot, miscued back towards the bowler
overpitched and that is pushed towards long-off for an easy single
tapped off the back foot towards long-off for a single
gets back and chops the ball towards cover
length ball on off is patted back to the bowler
length ball is helped towards long-on for one
swatted towards long-off for one more
another single to long-off, Gambhir this time
width offered, slapped to deep point for one more
Gambhir takes a couple of paces down the track and lofts the ball over mid-on, long-on has to get around to his left to stop that, time to get a couple
another lofted drive, towards sweeper cover, lands short of the fielder
length ball is driven by Kohli, he was looking to get it towards extra cover but inside-edges it instead towards midwicket
off the back foot and guided towards point for a single, brings up the 100 stand, their fourth century stand against Sri Lanka
patted back towards the bowler
length ball is played towards extra cover
length ball is driven towards long-off for an ambled single
a full toss is slapped towards short midwicket
length ball is eased past a diving Senanayake at cover, "Sachith, Sachith," shouts Dilshan urging the fielder to cut it off but it is too wide for Senanayake
pushed in front of point
length ball is driven towards sweeper cover
Gambhir stabs this towards deep point for a single

there's the wicket Sri Lanka were looking for, Kohli was looking to punch that short of length ball off the back foot, he tapped it straight back to Herath, who gleefully accepts the chance, it ws looking very easy for the Indian batsmen over the past hour or so
Dhoni starts straightaway with a single towards square leg
bowls it on the stumps and he whips it to the on side
angles it across and he steers it to sweeper on the off side
loose shot from Dhoni as he gets an inside edge to the on side, playing away from the body
fuller delivery and he gets an outside edge to to the off side
bowls it straighter and he stays behind the line to defend
full and wide and he drives to sweeper cover
starts off with a yorker wide of the off stump, he reaches out and digs it out
lovely shot, too full and wide outside the off stump and he reaches out and effortlessly glides it wide of point
full and really wide again and he stretches out to guide it straight to point
bowls it wide outside off again to lure him into the drive, Gambhir is happy to leave it alone
bowls it full outside off and he jams it out to point
full outside off and he squeezes it out to deep extra cover
bowls it a touch too short outside off and he chops it down to square third man
fullish on middle and leg and he pushes it down to mid-on
full on the pads and very neatly flicked down to deep midwicket
a bit too short to Dhoni and he chops it down to sweeper cover
on a good length outside off and he dabs it to the off side
tucks with soft hands towards midwicket and sets off quickly
full and wide outside off and he drives to the off side
fires it outside off and he jams it down to third man
half volley outside the off stump and he drives him firmly to sweeper cover
Malinga struggling with his line there, wide outside off and driven to the sweeper
full outside off and he squeezes it to mid-off
Perera grunts as he bowls that one towards Dhoni's pads, Dhoni stays in the crease and helps it along to the long leg boundary, fine leg was in the circle
a thick inside-edge as Dhoni looks to carve the ball towards cover
length ball is driven off the front foot towards mid-off
and another dot ball, pushed towards short cover
length ball is blocked by Dhoni, good comeback by Perera after that boundary early in the over
Dhoni looks to force the ball off the back foot, aiming for cover but edges it in front of square leg
pitched up, Dhoni stretches forward and defends towards the bowler
slaps it towards cover off the back foot, Dhoni was hurried into that shot
Dhoni charges down to get the pitch but he can't get underneath that one, defended to the leg side
again dhoni takes a couple of paces down and moving towards off as well, off the pads towards square leg
skips down and sends the ball towards long-on for an easy single
Dhoni looks to send that ball into orbit but ends up powering it along the ground near mid-on
full ball on the pads, worked behind square leg for a single
leans forward and nurdles the ball towards midwicket
high arm action from Mendis, not turning too much, defended towards cover
another googly, spins away from Gambhir, who waits on the back foot and slashes it towards cover
tossed up and full, on offstump, driven towards long-off
wide outside off, Dhoni leans across and guides that towards third man
worked  behind square leg for a single
defended off the front foot to the leg side
length ball is driven towards mid-on
Chandimal brings the roof down with a loud lbw appeal, but that was pitching well outside leg stump
full ball is driven back towards Dhoni
a full ball is drilled towards long-off for a single
eased towards long-on for one more
goes deep in the crease, and slashes that outside-off delivery behind point for a boundary
tossed up, full ball is driven towards cover by Gambhir
another ear-shattering lbw appeal, pitching outside leg again, closer this time, off the pad to the leg side
takes a big forward stride and defends towards the bowler
length ball is lofted towards sweeper cover off the front foot
driven off the back foot towards long-off for a single
short of length ball is whipped towards deep square leg off the back foot
defended from deep in the crease, towards cover
gets well forward and defends back to the bowler
three dot balls in a row to end the over
charges out and lofts that towards sweeper cover
looks to paddle that delivery down the leg side
stays back in the crease and slices the ball towards deep point
defended back towards the bowler
goes straight on after pitching on middle and leg, punched towards long-on
full ball is driven hard towards the bowler, who gets a hand on it but can't stop the single
Gambhir takes a couple of paces down the track and chips it between long-on and deep midwicket
looking to launch that inside-out, edged towards mid-on instead
full and wide, Dhoni came down the track and looked to power it down the ground but can only hit it as far as the bowler
another dot ball as Dhoni works this towards midwicket
a single off the last ball of the over, drive to long-off
pitched up and that is driven to long-on for a single
stays on the back foot and slams it towards midwicket for one more
full ball on the pads, defended towards midwicket
length ball is eased towards long-off for a single
tossed up by Mendis, driven past a diving bowler towards long-off
driven towards long-off for one more
darts it towards the pads, worked towards square leg for a single
full ball that Gambhir decided to play off the back foot, he misses the quicker one
jumps down the track and chips it towards deep midwicket
driven towards long-off for one more
sliced off the back foot towards deep backward point, they get two

and what a comeback, one of those deadly yorkers that confound batsmen so often, Dhoni looked to squeeze that one out but can't get bat in the way, crashes into the stumps, once again Sri Lanka strikes just when a partnership seemed to be calmly guiding India's chase.

oh my goodness, all that build-up over Rohit v Tiwary, Rohit is gone for a golden duck, a full, swinging delivery from Malinga is too good for Rohit, he was looking to work it to the leg side, he misses and that strikes his just above the boot, and his critics will have plenty more to say now, and Malinga is doing his bit to silence those questioning his performances against India
no hat-trick for Malinga, Raina works it towards deep square leg for a single, the crowd is absolutely buzzing now
works it to sweeper cover for another single
shortish and on leg stump, helped along to fine leg
another of those pinpoint yorkers, Gambhir keeps it out, defended down the track, what an over from Malinga, this game has changed completely
short and wide, bottom-edged towards the keeper as Raina looked to cut
outside off, helped along to third man for a single
just as Tony Greig says "Gambhir is playing beautifully," Gambhir chops a short ball perilously close to the stumps, once again he survives, he already had a French cut early in his innings
poked towards point, a bit of hesitation early on, then they decide to take the run, Dilshan had to hit direct, he doesn't
pushed to mid-off for a tight single, so Gambhir back on strike

there's the century for Gambhir, places the ball behind backward point, it's his 1tth ODI hundred, the dressing room is on its feet, Gambhir acknowledges the applause of the crowd, but he knows there's plenty more he'll have to do
driven firmly towards mid-off
pulling a short delivery from Malinga, not too well timed but gets a single
it's a low full toss outside off, guided towards deep point by Raina
another low full toss, on off stump, sliced towards point
full ball is whipped off his pads towards square leg
full again, squeezed out towards point
opened the face as he looked to steer that towards third man, he misses and Chandimal also doesn't collect cleanly
steers this down to third man for a single

run-out, terrific work from Udana, he might not have done too well with the ball, but his slide-rule throw could well have taken this game out of India's grasp, Gambhir pushed that towards mid-on and set off for a quick single, Udana was onto the ball and a direct hit catches Gambhir short, third umpire was called for, but Sangakkara in the dressing room was already signalling that it was out even before the replays came up, that's the 14th time Gambhir has been run out
full ball on off stump, dug out towards point
short of length ball is steered towards backward point
short and wide, this time Raina doesn't miss out, carves that past point for four
length ball is driven off the front foot towards the off side, the required rate is just above 8
whipped off the back foot towards midwicket for a single
punched dow2n the ground, a diving fielder at mid-off takes the pace off it and the batsmen get three
down the leg side, easy put away to fine leg, Irfan just needed to get a bit of bat on that, he did
length ball is driven towards extra cover
again on leg stump, can't get it past a diving short fine leg, just a single this time
the Powerplay is over, Mathews starts the over with back of a length ball that is outside off, Irfan swings at it and misses
solidly punched towards mid-off
short of length and outside off, Irfan goes for an old-fashioned slog and misses
length ball is pushed towards deep point for a single
just outside off, Raina gets into an awkward position as that ball cramps him up, somehow steers the ball to backward point
punched towards deep point for a couple
worked off the pads towards square leg
well outside off, Raina dabs at it and misses
slower ball from Udana, Raina is way too early on the shot, the ball lobs up towards mid-on, lands safe, the slower ball is Udana's speciality, used it a lot at the 2009 world T20
swatted towards square leg, this was only 96.9kph, two more for Irfan
full and on the pads, pushed towards midwicket
short of length ball, Raina opens the face and plays it towards backward point, takes the quick single, and he gets an overthrow as well
short ball that Irfan charged out to, he was going to charge out irrespective of the length, he swipes at it and misses
whipped towards deep square leg, well run there
makes room and carves that towards deep point
Raina makes room and looks to force the ball through the off, Mathews sends the ball wider outside off, Raina can't reach
dropped, Sachithra Senanayake dived to his right at cover to try take a shoulder-high catch, Raina had absolutely hammered that one, Senanayake can't hang on to it, Raina survives
angling across, Irfan is beaten by that one
moves in towards Raina, it was another slower ball from Udana, Raina barely gets bat on that and the ball settles at his feet
Raina backs away and swats a delivery towards sweeper cover, plenty of screaming before the batsmen decide to come back for  two

short and way down the leg side, Raina had jumped down the track, would have been a wide down the leg side if Raina let that one go, he decides to go after it instead, and gets it past short fine leg for a boundary
slower ball again, on offstump, length delivery, drilled towards long-off for a single
full ball is punched towards long-on, Raina wanted two, Irfan wasn't so sure, just a single
once more Raina gives the charge, he was looking for an almighty heave, Udana bowled it short and outside off, a thick edge results and the ball runs past short third man for four, 12 off the over
full and wide from Malinga, helped towards cover by Irfan
short ball from Malinga, Raina not entirely sure what to do with that, he looked to hammer it over the off side though he seemed to be falling away to the leg side, he misses
the Malinga yorker, it is outside off though, Raina just bends his knees and opens the bat-face to guide the ball past the keeper for four
quick short ball, Raina was looking to uppercut that over the keeper, it was too close to his body, and it was too quick for him as well
short ball again, slower this time, slammed towards midwicket by raina for a single
edged, and that's another four streaky runs, it was full and outside off, off the edge and past a diving Chandimal, ten off the over
not a great start for Mathews, Raina playes one of his trademark strokes, getting on one knee and launching that length ball over extra cover for a boundary, Raina moves on to 40
slightly shorter, on off stump, poked towards point for a single
pitched up and driven firmly towards long-off, 'two,two, two," is the call but they settle for a single

looks to swat that over the leg side, shortish ball that Raina misses, the ball misses off stump as well, sails over, Mathews has his hands on his head, Raina looks up at the sky happy to still be there
more luck for India here, an inside-edge races to the third-man boundary, Mathews can't believe it
pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
turning out to be Raina magic here, bludgeons this first ball of the over long-on for six, brings up his half-century as well, what a shot to bring it up with
yorker well outside off, Raina wanted to guide that past the keeper for four more, but doesn't connect

Sri Lanka needed a direct hit there, Raina punched the ball towards Mathews at mid-off and sets off for the run, a direct hit would have ended Raina's stay, Mathews misses and is disgusted with himself
guides it wide of extra cover for a single
full and wide, Raina squeezes it towards deep backward point for a single
full and outside off, guided towards deep point for one more
helps this to short fine leg for a single
attempted slower ball loops towards Raina as a full toss, Raina backs away and sends that through the off side for a couple
Raina wanted to thump that through the off side as well, but edges it towards mid-on for a single
short of length ball on the leg stump, swatted towards deep square leg
Raina launches that full ball towards sweeper cover, Tharanga moves across to field that one, Raina wanted three but settles for two
another lofted hit from Raina, towards deep extra cover,Udana has to get across from long-off to cut it off, two more to India
a yorker just outside off, Irfan has sensibly been taking the singles and turning over the strike to Raina in the past few overs, he does it again

another yorker, on off stump, raina manages to squeeze that out towards short cover, there's a direct hit this time, but Irfan has just made his ground, to make things worse for Sri Lanka, India sneak an overthrow as well
full and outside off, crisply hit by Irfan, just needed to be placed better, can't beat Dilshan at backward point
a full toss from Malinga, crunched down the ground, long-off does the fielding but can't prevent the second
Malinga keeps it full, Irfan jabs it towards point, a diving from the fielder then takes the pace off the ball but can't stop it, Irfan races back for the second
full ball is driven towards the bowler, Malinga fields and it is a dot ball, India need six off the final over
short of length ball is swatted towards deep midwicket, Raina gets two for his efforts
looks to hammer it through the off side, ends up sends it straight down the track, Mathews tries to field that one, but can't as it was too low for him and hit too hard, one run taken

after several overs of calm batting, Irfan jumps down the track and looks to slog a short of length ball over the leg side, he misses, the crowd loves it and roars its appreciation, it's 3 off 3 now, Raina walks up and has a chat with Irfan
it's over, India have won, this is the highest successful chase at this stadium, Irfan launches a length ball to deep midwicket for four, he takes off helmet and jumps for joy
